pullRequest.title: Prevent HMS from collecting stats when creating external tables
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #3624.
This fix is attempting to cause Hive (2.x, 3.x) to skip computing file count stats (see https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/branch-2.3/metastore/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/MetaStoreUtils.java#L275-L280).

nodes.bodyText:
Is it suitable to external tables only?
(it's likely, but please mention this in a comment or link to apache/hive repo, to the place where this is being if-d on)

Does it have to be conditional?
I don't think there is a situation where I would want metastore to collect the basic stats (we update them for managed tables, and for external tables you are now disabling them)
Also, do we need to fill tableParameters, or only the EnvironmentContext?

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                                    chosenGetTableAlternative,
          
          
            
                                                    chosenAlterTableAlternative,
if return is required, use return null (0 looks more meaningful)
remove void alterTable(String databaseName, String tableName, Table newTable), it's unused now
